title: Geopolitical change offers an opportunity for India to emerge as global tech leader: Economist Roopa Purushothaman - The Indian Express
content: Geopolitical change offers an opportunity for India to emerge as global tech leader: Economist Roopa Purushothaman  The Indian Express
description: Roopa Purushothaman was addressing the maiden batch of working professionals enrolled for the Master of Business Administration programme at the at the Central Institute of Road Transport which will operate as the satellite campus of Indian Institute of Management, Nagpur.
